phases.name: Purchase Orders & Bills
phases.milestone: PO & Bill System Live in SERP
phases.goal: Move all PO creation, approvals, arrivals, and bill creation to SERP. On arrival, push only quantities to Odoo (not full PO). Bills created in SERP are automatically sent to QuickBooks.

phases.name: Raw Materials & Components
phases.goal: Move product master data ownership to SERP. Inventory counts remain in Odoo until Phase 4.

phases.name: Manufacturing Orders
phases.goal: Move Bill of Materials (BOM) ownership and manufacturing order creation to SERP. Production pushes to Odoo for inventory updates.

phases.name: Inventory Management
phases.goal: Move all inventory tracking to SERP. Odoo becomes optional/deprecated.
